title: ‘Can’t replace your doctor with it’: Symbiosis Artificial Intelligence Institute head Dr Shruti Patil on safe use of AI in 2026
description: Dr Shruti Patil says that while AI tools can assist with tasks, users should not share sensitive information and verify information independently.
content:
Q: In what ways can people safely incorporate AI into their lives?

title: Sovereign funds push into tech as assets swell to $15 trillion
description: Overall, sovereign owned investors ploughed $66 billion into investments in artificial intelligence and digitalization in 2025
content:
Sovereign wealth funds globally amassed a record $15 trillion in assets under management in a year when many deepened their technology investments and profited from buoyant markets, according to a new report by Global SWF.

title: Nvidia is getting creative as options to use its cash flood narrow
description: Blowout artificial-intelligence spending fills chip maker’s coffers, but the Groq deal shows that the company needs to think creatively.

title: 10 pieces of tech jargon that confused us in 2025
description: The obvious culprit is the artificial intelligence boom that has upended the tech industry, birthing a fresh glossary of lingo.

title: Why some people are turning to artificial intelligence for mental health needs
description: According to a George Mason University flash poll of about 500 people across the country, about 50% reported using AI for support with mental health issues.
content:
Many people are turning to artificial intelligence for coping, feedback, guidance and to be a sort of confidant.
